promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word pokemon name for a gigantic rare deer steel-type with ancient antlers. It can be found in mountain-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon or steel. Ony answer with the generated name:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Antleredra, a gigantic rare deer steel-type pokemon. It can be found in mountain-like environments It has the following abilities: anchor-shot. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word deer or steel or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of steel-type pokemon, deer-like, rare, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, grey ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Antleredra, a towering titan who roams the mountains. Anchors foes with a single shot! Brave and fierce.
